ComicInfo.Summary: Titans Hunt, Chapter Three: Friends Like These: As Gnarrk springs Roy from jail, the fight between Grayson, Garth, and Donna Troy leads to a place that awakens memories. Meanwhile Lilith is tormented by a mystic figure who later strikes at most of the cast with some kind of sound only they can hear, hitting Mal Duncan the hardest.
